variants.Description in input context: Heterozygous mutations in the kinase domain of PINK1

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Stable dopaminergic neuronal cell line with coexpression of wild-type and mutant PINK1

Material used.Description: Cells were transfected to express either wild-type or mutant PINK1, simulating heterozygous and homozygous states.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased apoptosis and reduced DCm in mutant PINK1 cells under oxidative stress
Readout description.Result Description: Mutant PINK1 cells showed increased apoptosis rate and decreased mitochondrial membrane potential (DCm) compared to wild-type cells under oxidative stress.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 expression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector transfected cells were used as a negative control.
